posts.title: 使用AutoHotkeyScript屏蔽系统快按键
posts.text: 来源于知乎，在脚本里写入 123;【屏蔽alt+空格】!space::Return

posts.title: Request笔记
posts.text: 转载于：黑马程序员JavaWeb全套基础教程，java web从入门到项目实战（IDEA版javaweb）https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1qv4y1o79t 笔记仅供个人研究学习使用，无商业等其他用途。获取请求行数据GET /Gensokyo/demo01 name=Reimu HTTP/1.1 方法:1.获取请求方式: GET 1String getMethod();2.(!) 获取虚拟目录: /Gensokyo 1String getContextpath();3.获取Servlet路径: /demo01 1String getServletpath()4.获取get方式请求参数: name=Reimu 1String getQueryString()5.(!) 获取请求URI||URL : 统一资源定位符(URL):http: //localhost/Gensokyo/demo01 1String getRequestURI(): 统一资源标识符(URI) 1StringBuffer getRequestURL():http: //localhost/Gensokyo/demo016.获取协议及版本: HTTP/1.1 1String getProtocol()7.获取客户机的IP地址: 1String getRemoteAddr()

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
